author: Tony Rutherford , HNN Entertainment Editor
title: Tsubasacon "More Amazing Than Told"
text:
Saturday, October 10, 2015 - 04:31 Updated 40 min ago by Tony Rutherford , HNN Entertainment Editor Huntington Mayor Steve Williams participated inn the opening ceremonies of the 2014 Tsubasacon. "It was more amazing than I had been told," the Mayor told HNN earlier this week. 
For 2015, the three day event has expanded from the Conference Center to the full Big Sandy Arena. The event continues Saturday and Sunday. 
"People who come to this event love and enjoy Huntington and make the downtown more lively than it already is. The fact that its new and they are coming back is wonderful," Williams said. "They eat in our restaurants, stay in our hotels, buy gasoline, and they tell friends just how Huntington is," the Mayor said, explaining that the economic multiplier that is difficult to determine. is "how much they spend in the weeks following that." Suffice to say, "it's a huge impact."
